title: Two grade-20 officers of Audit & Accounts service deputed at SCP
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 10 (APP):The Supreme Court of Pakistan has received the services of two senior officers from the Pakistan Audit and Accounts Service, Zulfiqar Ahmed Bajwa and Muhammad Aleem Akhtar, on a one-year deputation basis.
According to separate notifications issued by the Office of the Auditor General of Pakistan on Thursday, both officers have been transferred as per the notification issued from the Establishment Division dated July 9.
Zulfiqar Ahmed Bajwa, a Grade-20 officer, was previously serving as Director General of Social Security Net. He has now been appointed as Chief Finance and Accounts Officer at the Supreme Court.
Similarly, Muhammad Aleem Akhtar, also a Grade-20 officer, was serving as Chief Finance and Accounts Officer in the Establishment Division. He will now serve as Chief Internal Auditor at the Supreme Court.
Both officers are from the Pakistan Audit and Accounts Service and will serve in their new roles for a period of one year.
